hero.title: Transform your business with
hero.description: Personalized automation solutions that connect systems, optimize processes and drive results. Technology that works for you.

sales.title: Sales Agent
sales.description: Automates the entire sales process, from prospecting to closing. Identifies qualified leads, personalizes approaches and optimizes conversions.

support.title: Support Agent
support.description: Offers 24/7 support with accurate and contextualized responses. Resolves queries, processes requests and escalates complex cases.

process.title: Process Agent
process.description: Manages internal processes and optimizes workflows. Automates repetitive tasks and monitors performance in real time.

questions.question: How long does it take to implement a custom AI solution?
questions.answer: The time varies according to the complexity of the project, but on average we start delivering solutions from 21 business days after the initial alignment.

questions.question: Does the solution integrate with the systems we already use?
questions.answer: Yes. Our solutions are developed to integrate with CRMs, ERPs, databases and tools like WhatsApp, Notion, Trello, Google Sheets and much more.

questions.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use AI agents?
questions.answer: No. Our workflows are created to be completely intuitive. We provide simple training and support for your team to take advantage of AI's full potential without complications.

questions.question: How does the implementation work?
questions.answer: We start with a detailed schedule, aligning all stages of the project. Implementation happens progressively, with partial deliveries that allow adjustments and improvements throughout the process. This way, the agent can be shaped according to your needs before final delivery.

questions.question: How does it work after project delivery?
questions.answer: After delivery, we continue to monitor your project with technical monitoring and support whenever necessary. If questions, adjustments or any instability arise, our team will be available to help quickly and objectively.

contact.title: Let's build your
contact.description: Fill in your details and talk to our specialists.

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters

toast.title: Proposal sent!
toast.errorDescription: Please correct the highlighted fields and try again.

footer.copyright: © 2025 Mind AI Technology - All Rights Reserved.

terms.title: Terms of
terms.description: These terms govern the use of Mind AI Technology's artificial intelligence services. By contracting our services, you agree to all the terms described below.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
content: By contracting the services of Mind AI Technology, a private legal entity, registered under CNPJ [CNPJ], headquartered at R. S-1, Q. 153 - L. 25 - St. Bueno, Goiânia - GO, 74230-220, you ("Client") expressly agree to these Terms of Service.
These terms constitute a binding legal agreement between you and Mind AI Technology. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not contract our services.
Contracting may occur through signed commercial proposal, electronic acceptance, or beginning of service provision after mutual approval of the project scope.

aiServices.title: AI Services
aiServices.description: Development, implementation and maintenance of personalized artificial intelligence solutions, including intelligent agents, process automation and integration with existing systems.

intelligentAgents.title: Intelligent Agents
intelligentAgents.description: AI systems capable of executing specific tasks autonomously, such as customer service, sales, process management and data analysis.

clientData.title: Client Data
clientData.description: All information, data, files, databases and content provided by the Client for development and operation of AI services.

customSolution.title: Custom Solution
customSolution.description: AI system developed specifically to meet the unique needs and processes of the Client.

services.title: Service Description
services.description: Mind AI Technology offers the following main services:

development.title: Custom AI Development
development.description: Creation of tailor-made intelligent agents to automate specific business processes.

integration.title: System Integration
integration.description: Connection of AI agents with CRMs, ERPs, databases and existing tools.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: Implementation of automated workflows for sales, customer service, management and data analysis.

support.title: Support and Maintenance
support.description: Continuous monitoring, adjustments, improvements and specialized technical support.

clientResponsibilities.title: Client Responsibilities
items: Provide accurate and complete information about their processes and needs
Make available access to systems and data necessary for development
Actively collaborate during the development and testing process
Maintain confidentiality of shared technical information
Make payments according to agreed schedule
Use services in a legal and ethical manner

ourResponsibilities.title: Our Responsibilities
items: Develop AI solutions according to agreed specifications
Offer technical support during the agreed period
Maintain absolute confidentiality about Client data and information
Implement adequate security measures for data protection

codeAndTechnology.title: Code and Technology
codeAndTechnology.description: The source code, algorithms, AI models and technologies developed by Mind AI remain the exclusive property of the company, being licensed for Client use according to agreed scope.

clientData.title: Client Data
clientData.description: All data provided by the Client remains their exclusive property. Mind AI will not use this data for other purposes beyond providing contracted services.

derivedKnowledge.title: Derived Knowledge
derivedKnowledge.description: Insights, methodologies and general knowledge developed during service provision may be used by Mind AI in future projects, provided they do not identify or compromise specific Client information.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection and Privacy
dataProtection.lgpdCompliance: This section is in compliance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law 13.709/2018)

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.description: Mind AI acts as a personal data processor, processing information exclusively for providing contracted services, under instructions from the Client (controller).

securityMeasures.title: Security Measures
items: Data encryption in transit and at rest

dataSubjectRights.title: Data Subject Rights
dataSubjectRights.description: We guarantee the exercise of rights provided for in the LGPD, including access, correction, anonymization, blocking, deletion and portability of personal data.

warranties.title: Warranties Offered
items: Correction of bugs identified during warranty period

limitations.title: Liability Limitations
limitations.description: Mind AI is not responsible for:
items: Decisions made based on AI system results
Damages arising from inappropriate or unauthorized use
Interruptions due to force majeure reasons
limitations.limitationNote: Mind AI's total liability is limited to the total amount paid by the Client in the specific project where the problem occurred.

valuesAndSchedule.title: Values and Schedule
valuesAndSchedule.description: Values are established in the specific commercial proposal for each project, with payment schedule linked to deliveries and development milestones.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
items: Other forms agreed in the proposal

latePayment.title: Late Payment
latePayment.description: Payment delay exceeding 15 days may result in service suspension and charging of 1% monthly interest, plus a 2% fine on the overdue amount.

mutualAgreement.title: Termination by Mutual Agreement
mutualAgreement.description: The contract may be terminated at any time by agreement between the parties, with proportional financial settlement for services already provided.

breach.title: Termination for Breach
breach.description: Either party may terminate the contract in case of material breach of obligations, after notification and 15-day period for regularization.

effects.title: Effects of Termination
items: Immediate cessation of services under development
Delivery of materials and codes already developed
Return of data and confidential information

applicableLaw.title: Applicable Law
applicableLaw.description: This contract is governed by the laws of the Federative Republic of Brazil, especially the Civil Code, Consumer Protection Code (when applicable) and General Data Protection Law.

competentForum.title: Competent Forum
competentForum.description: The forum of [City/State] is elected to resolve any controversies arising from this contract, with the parties waiving any other.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.description: These terms may be updated periodically. Active clients will be notified 30 days in advance of significant changes.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions about these terms, contact us through the official channels available on our website or by email: contato@mindtecnologia-ai.com.br

footer.title: Mind AI Technology - Terms of Service

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: This policy describes how Mind AI Technology collects, uses, stores and protects your personal data, in compliance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD).
privacy.dataProtectionNote: Your data is processed with the highest level of security and transparency.

generalInfo.title: General Information
content: Mind AI Technology, a private legal entity, registered under CNPJ [CNPJ], headquartered at R. S-1, Q. 153 - L. 25 - St. Bueno, Goiânia - GO, 74230-220, is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of its clients, users and partners.

This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, share and protect your personal information, in compliance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD - Law 13.709/2018) and other applicable regulations.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.description: We collect different types of data depending on your interaction with our services:

purpose.title: Processing Purpose
purpose.description: Your personal data is processed for the following specific purposes:

serviceProvision.title: Service Provision
serviceProvision.description: Development, implementation and maintenance of personalized AI solutions.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Sending information about services, technical updates and customer support.

improvement.title: Service Improvement
improvement.description: Usage analysis for improvement and development of new features.

legal.title: Legal Compliance
legal.description: Meeting legal, regulatory and contractual obligations.

security.title: Security
security.description: Fraud prevention, system protection and information security.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.description: The processing of your personal data is based on the following legal bases provided for in the LGPD:

contract.title: Contract Execution
contract.description: For providing contracted services and fulfilling contractual obligations.

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: When you expressly authorize processing for specific purposes.

legalObligation.title: Legal Obligation
legalObligation.description: To comply with applicable legal and regulatory obligations.

legitimateInterest.title: Legitimate Interest
legitimateInterest.description: For service improvement, security and fraud prevention.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: Your personal data may be shared only in the following situations:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.description: With technical partners who assist in service provision, always under strict confidentiality contracts.

authorities.title: Competent Authorities
authorities.description: When required by law, court order or by regulatory authorities.

consent.title: Express Consent
consent.description: In specific situations where you expressly authorize sharing.

dataSharing.noSaleNote: We never sell, rent or commercialize your personal data.

security.title: Security and Protection
security.description: We implement rigorous technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

technical.title: Technical Measures
items: Data encryption in transit and at rest

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: We keep your personal data only for the time necessary for specific purposes:

serviceProvision.title: During Service Provision
serviceProvision.description: While the contractual relationship and service provision lasts.

legalPeriod.title: Legal Period
legalPeriod.description: As required by legal obligations (e.g.: tax data for 5 years).

secureElimination.title: Secure Elimination
secureElimination.description: After the retention period, data is eliminated securely and irreversibly.

userRights.title: Your Rights as Data Subject
userRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Access
access.description: Confirm the existence and obtain access to your personal data.

correction.title: Correction
correction.description: Request correction of incomplete, inaccurate or outdated data.

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.description: Request deletion of unnecessary, excessive or non-compliant processed data.

portability.title: Portability
portability.description: Request data portability to another service provider.

opposition.title: Opposition
opposition.description: Oppose processing based on legitimate interest.

userRights.exerciseNote: To exercise your rights, contact us via email: contato@mindtecnologia-ai.com.br

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for basic site and service functionality.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: Collect information about how you use our site for improvements.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.description: Allow personalizing your experience and remembering your preferences.

cookies.managementNote: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

updates.title: Updates
updates.description: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our services, data practices or legal requirements.

notification.title: Notification
notification.description: We will notify about significant changes via email or notice on our website, with a minimum of 30 days advance notice.

currentVersion.title: Current Version
currentVersion.description: The date of last update is always indicated at the beginning of this policy. We recommend periodic review of this document.

contactDpo.title: Data Protection Officer (DPO) Contact
contactDpo.description: For questions related to data protection, exercise of rights or clarifications about this policy, contact our Data Protection Officer:

contact.title: Data Protection Officer (DPO)
contact.address: R. S-1, Q. 153 - L. 25 - St. Bueno, Goiânia - GO, 74230-220

contactDpo.responseNote: We commit to responding to your requests within 15 business days.

cookies.title: Cookie
cookies.description: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website, ensuring transparency about collection and use of browsing data.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies
content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet or smartphone) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
Cookies allow a website to recognize your device and store some information about your preferences or previous actions. This improves your browsing experience, making it faster and more personalized.
whatAreCookies.securityNote: Cookies cannot access other files on your device or install viruses.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies
typesOfCookies.description: We use different types of cookies, each with a specific purpose:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Necessary for basic website functionality. Without them, some features would not work.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: Collect information about how you use the website to improve its performance.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.description: Allow the website to remember your choices and provide enhanced features.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to make advertising messages more relevant to you.

cookiesWeUse.title: Cookies We Use
cookiesWeUse.description: Specific details of cookies used on our website:

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.description: We also use cookies from third-party services for specific functionalities:

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: For traffic analysis and user behavior.

hotjar.title: Hotjar
hotjar.description: For user experience analysis and heat maps.

cookieManagement.title: How to Manage Cookies
cookieManagement.description: You have full control over cookies. You can manage them in several ways:

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.description: All browsers allow managing cookies through their settings:

consentBanner.title: Consent Banner
consentBanner.description: Use our cookie banner to accept or reject specific cookie categories. Your preferences will be remembered for future visits.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis
legalBasis.description: The use of cookies is based on the following legal bases:

consent.title: Consent (Art. 7, I of LGPD)
consent.description: For non-essential cookies, we obtain your explicit consent through the cookie banner.

legitimateInterest.title: Legitimate Interest (Art. 7, IX of LGPD)
legitimateInterest.description: For essential cookies necessary for website operation and service improvement.

contractExecution.title: Contract Execution (Art. 7, V of LGPD)
contractExecution.description: For cookies necessary for providing contracted services.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: Data collected through cookies is kept for the following periods:

sessionCookies.title: Session Cookies
sessionCookies.description: Automatically deleted when you close the browser.

persistentCookies.title: Persistent Cookies
persistentCookies.description: Kept for the period specified in each cookie (from 30 days to 2 years).

analyticsData.title: Analytics Data
analyticsData.description: Aggregated and anonymized data may be kept for up to 26 months for trend analysis.

policyUpdates.title: Updates to this Policy
content: This Cookie Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for operational, legal or regulatory reasons.
When we make significant changes, we will notify you through the cookie banner or other appropriate means before the changes take effect.
policyUpdates.reviewNote: We recommend that you review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.

contact.title: Questions about Cookies?
contact.description: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy or want to exercise your rights, contact us.

cookieBanner.title: We use cookies
cookieBanner.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website, personalize content and analyze our traffic.

showcase.title: Agents that Adapt
showcase.description: Beyond ready-made models, we create personalized intelligent agents, designed to precisely meet your company's needs.
showcase.cardDescription: Artificial Intelligence is no longer a thing of the future. Today, it's within your reach, ready to automate tasks, optimize processes and free up your time for what really matters.

strategy.title: Advanced Intelligence,
strategy.description: Inside what makes our AI so efficient

automation.title: Automate with Intelligence
automation.description: Reduce manual tasks with **automations that learn** from your processes and **make decisions** in real time.

integration.title: Connect Everything with Precision
integration.description: We integrate your **systems, APIs and tools** to create a **unified ecosystem**, efficient and intelligent.

workflows.title: Strategic and Adaptable Workflows
workflows.description: We create **AI workflows** that adapt to your business reality — **from simple to complex**, everything under control.

monitoring.title: Growth with Total Monitoring
monitoring.description: Our solutions **scale with your business** and offer **traceability and adjustments** in real time, always with performance.
